EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Monday Highlights / Schedule 8-22-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Come early and enjoy some SpringOne Platform extras!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Getting to SpringOne Platform early? No problem! Join us the Monday (9/24) before SpringOne Platform officially kicks off for a number of activities to start the event off right. Community Hub 2pm-4:30pm and 6pm-10pm Get to know some of our awesome sponsors. There there will lots of giveaways and games, so be there, or be square.
Pre-Conference Training Our training courses are almost completely sold out! However, we still have a few spots left for our Steeltoe .NET Developer <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/training/steeltoe?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-monday-highlight-2018]]> course if you’re interested in learning how to develop ASPNET applications using the latest Steeltoe releases. Apache Geode™ Summit 1pm-6pm Come join us for our 3rd annual Apache Geode™ Summit <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/geode?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-monday-highlight-2018]]> and experience a variety of Geode talks and sessions. Engage with experts, core committers, and leading production users of Geode for in-memory data management and related projects. Registration is required. Seating is limited.
Open Space 2pm-5pm Be surprised at SpringOne Platform Open Space <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/open-space?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-monday-highlight-2018]]>—the simplest meeting format that could possibly work. Explore and discuss some of the hottest topics around. Don’t procrastinate—facilitate! Partner Workshops Sign up and attend one of our Partner workshops! Registration is required. Seating is limited.
9am-10:20am Building the Unbreakable Continuous Delivery Pipeline: Put Your Concourse Pipeline on Auto-pilot with Dynatrace <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/dynatrace]]> 9am-12pm APIs and Microservices Management with Apigee & Pivotal <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/apigee]]> 10:40am-12pm Minio For PCF: Private Cloud Storage for Apps Running on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/minio]]> 10:40am-12pm Monitor and Measure to Success: New Relic and Pivotal <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/new-relic]]> More coming soon! Opening Reception and Lightning Talks 6pm-10pm And what would a conference be without having a Hub Opening Night Reception and Lightning Talks <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/lightning-talks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-monday-highlight-2018]]>? Let’s have some fun on Monday evening and start SpringOne Platform right. We look forward to seeing you in September! The SpringOne Platform Team
